Comment: > Even liberal Pro Publica has reported that a lab leak is the probable cause.  The [Pro Publica article](https://www.propublica.org/article/senate-report-covid-19-origin-wuhan-lab) basically expounds on a Senate Interim report saying “the hypothesis of a natural zoonotic origin no longer deserves the benefit of the doubt”.    Thing is, Dr Fauci and everyone who discusses the issue have said all along that a lab leak couldn't be ruled out, but viral transmission from animals to humans is most likely because it happens all the time  The Senate report statement isn't conclusive; it's leans more to a lab leak than Fauci's statement but we're talking shades of grey  And it's fair to say Senate report was prepared during trump's first term, and we know trump likes science to agree with him
